item.title: Building my Startup in Public
item.description:
I always wanted to develop journaling habit, as it makes me articulate my thoughts into words, it’s helpful for me in lot of different ways.

  • It acts as a medium to express my thoughts and feelings when I’m insecure to share it with others.
  • It helps me in decision making in critical situations while setting the emotions aside.

But somehow, I kept quitting in few days. I’ve almost started it 3 times and quit every time. And that’s how I stumbled upon this idea!
